programme.title: The Most Wonderful Time of the Year
programme.desc: A snowbound stranger (Warren Christie) brightens the holidays for a retired police officer (Henry Winkler) and his niece (Brooke Burns).

programme.title: Trivia at St. Nick's
programme.desc: Locals compete in a Christmas bar trivia tournament at the end of the semester.

programme.title: Next Stop, Christmas
programme.desc: Angie wonders what life would be like if she had married an ex who became famous. When she finds herself magically transported into the past, Angie has the chance to relive that Christmas and learn what (and who) is truly important to her.

programme.title: Deck the Walls
programme.desc: Interior designer, Rose DeMonte, uses her skills back in her hometown to renovate a Christmas Charity Home for her brother Sal and his contractor Brysen's home flipping company.

programme.title: A Royal Christmas Crush
programme.desc: Ava accepts the opportunity of a lifetime to work at the Royal Ice Hotel, which leads to a surprise whirlwind romance with the most important guest of all, the prince himself.

programme.title: If I Only Had Christmas
programme.desc: A cheerful publicist teams up with a cynical business owner to help a charity in need at Christmastime.

programme.title: Pride, Prejudice and Mistletoe
programme.desc: When Darcy returns to her hometown for Christmas, and she reconnects with Luke, a former rival, they must plan a charity event together. As she spends time with her family and Luke, she starts to realize what matters most in life.

programme.title: Following Yonder Star
programme.desc: A former television star waits out a scandal in Vermont. She becomes close with the innkeeper and his daughter while she helps him direct the local Christmas pageant.

programme.title: Our Holiday Story
programme.desc: A loving couple shares the story of how they met and fell in love when their daughter's boyfriend comes to meet them for the first time at Christmas.

programme.title: The Secret Gift of Christmas
programme.desc: A personal shopper helps her new client and recent widower reconnect with his young daughter, find them both everything on their wish list, and rediscover the joys of Christmas.

programme.title: Christmas in Tahoe
programme.desc: To save her family's hotel Christmas show, a talent booker must ask for help from her ex-boyfriend -- the lead guitarist of a now-famous band that fired her as its manager years ago.

programme.title: Christmas by Design
programme.desc: A fashion designer learns what's most important in life when she joins a Christmas challenge to create a new holiday-themed collection.

programme.title: Christmas With a Kiss
programme.desc: A woman returns home to help with her family's Christmas Carnival, and romance ignites. A photo journalist curates a surprise reunion.

programme.title: Coming Home for Christmas
programme.desc: Lizzie Richfield lands a job as house manager for the exquisite Ashford Estate in the Virginia countryside. While preparing the place for sale, Lizzie plans one final Christmas Eve gala for the family, although they seem to be a family in name only.

programme.title: A Biltmore Christmas
programme.desc: A magical hourglass sends modern-day screenwriter Lucy Hardgrove to the set of the 1947 holiday movie classic "His Merry Wife!" However, before she can return to the present, Lucy must make things right or threaten to alter the future forever.

programme.title: Everything Christmas
programme.desc: A woman and her roommate embark on a road trip to Yuletide Springs, a town where Christmas is celebrated year-round.

programme.title: A Shoe Addict's Christmas
programme.desc: Department store employee Noelle visits Christmases of past, present and future as her guardian angel helps her navigate her wishes for a connection with her father, her dream career and love.

programme.title: A Very Merry Bridesmaid
programme.desc: Leah's 30th birthday is on Christmas Eve, the same day as her brother's wedding. Her childhood crush is back in town for the ceremony and he's determined to make sure her special day doesn't go by the wayside.

programme.title: A Very Merry Mix-Up
programme.desc: A woman plans to meet her future in-laws at Christmas and, through a serendipitous series of events, spends the holiday with a warm and caring family whose son catches her eye.

programme.title: The Santa Summit
programme.desc: At a Santa-themed holiday event, three teachers get their groove back, strengthen their friendship and unexpectedly find love along the way.

programme.title: Sugarplummed
programme.desc: When Emily wishes for a perfect Christmas like the ones found in the popular Sugarplum movies, she's shocked when Sugarplum herself appears to help her fulfill it.

programme.title: All I Need for Christmas
programme.desc: Looking for inspiration, singer-songwriter Maggie travels home and finds a spark with app developer Archer, who is trying to repair his relationship with his sister.

programme.title: Christmas Wishes & Mistletoe Kisses
programme.desc: Weeks before Christmas, an interior designer is hired to decorate the estate of a wealthy businessman.

programme.title: A Novel Noel
programme.desc: A NYC book editor takes on a temporary gig running a Maine bookstore. Battling with the owners' son, she rediscovers her passion for nurturing creativity.

programme.title: My Christmas Guide
programme.desc: After losing his eyesight, a college professor adopts a seeing-eye dog from a guide dog trainer. As they all spend time together, his confidence returns and his heart begins to open.

programme.title: Debbie Macomber's Dashing Through the Snow
programme.desc: A young woman becomes stranded in an airport at Christmastime and accepts a ride from a man who rented the last rental car in town. As they head north, a hint of romance develops when they encounter a few bumps on the road.

programme.title: The Santa Stakeout
programme.desc: Two police detectives posing as newlyweds to solve recent holiday party heists are swept up by Christmas while observing the prime suspect.

programme.title: Return to Christmas Creek
programme.desc: After being told her new holiday app lacked Christmas spirit, a young CEO returns to her hometown to rediscover the meaning of the holidays.

programme.title: Angel Falls: A Novel Holiday
programme.desc: Book editor Hannah must work with former rival Ryan to help a potential writer find her way, and Angel Anthony reminds them about Christmas spirit and the value of community.

programme.title: Memories of Christmas
programme.desc: When Noelle inherits her mother's house, she finds out that for the past few years her aging mother had been hiring professionals to decorate it for Christmas. Noelle tells the decorator that the deal is off, but he refuses to take no for an answer.

programme.title: Christmas Wonderland
programme.desc: Heidi returns home to watch her niece and nephew and comes face to face with her high school love. Heidi offers to help him with a dance, and the more time she spends decorating, the more she finds herself inspired to start painting again.

programme.title: Christmas Tree Lane
programme.desc: When music store owner Meg spearheads community efforts to save her street from demolition, she is shocked to find out that the man she's falling for is working for the company that she is fighting.

programme.title: Northern Lights of Christmas
programme.desc: Life deals Zoey Hathaway a strange blow when she inherits a reindeer farm and becomes buried in taking care of the animals and all of the Christmas responsibilities.

programme.title: Love You Like Christmas
programme.desc: A high-powered executive reconsiders her priorities when car trouble leads her to Christmas Valley, a town in love with Christmas.

programme.title: A Season for Family
programme.desc: Maddy's adopted son, Wesley, has just one wish for Christmas -- to meet his brother, Cody, who was adopted into a different family. Circumstances soon bring the two siblings together while sparks fly between their respective parents.

programme.title: Mystery on Mistletoe Lane
programme.desc: New to town, Heidi Wicks and her kids discover a Christmas mystery in their historic home. Local handyman and historian David helps along the way, finding his own surprising connection.

programme.title: My Sweet Austrian Holiday
programme.desc: Charlotte inherits a chocolate shop from her grandparents but soon finds herself in a battle with a large developer who wants to buy the building to turn it into an exclusive shopping boutique.

programme.title: Jingle Bell Bride
programme.desc: A wedding planner finds romance with a handsome local after traveling to a remote town in Alaska to find a rare flower for a celebrity client.

programme.title: A Song for Christmas
programme.desc: A pop star becomes stranded in a small town in the dead of winter and finds refuge at a family's beleaguered dairy farm.

programme.title: Magic Stocking
programme.desc: Lindsey, a widowed single mother, stays closed off to life after losing her husband. When she buys a stocking at a craft fair, her family members begin finding items in it that have importance in their lives.

programme.title: Magical Christmas Ornaments
programme.desc: Marie finds her Christmas spirit reawakened when her mother begins sending her the family's Christmas ornaments. As each ornament arrives, it brings a positive change to Marie's life, including an introduction to the handsome man from next door.

programme.title: A Timeless Christmas
programme.desc: A man travels from 1903 to 2020, where he meets a tour guide at his historic mansion and gets to experience a 21st century Christmas.

programme.title: Two Turtle Doves
programme.desc: Dr. Sharon Hayes returns home to search for a beloved family heirloom. With the help of an adorable little girl and her dispirited father, together they rediscover the magic of Christmas.

programme.title: The Christmas Secret
programme.desc: A struggling single mother (Bethany Joy Lenz) searches for a lost family heirloom that she hopes will bring her love and good fortune in time for the holidays.

programme.title: A Little Christmas Charm
programme.desc: A jewelry designer teams up with an investigative reporter to find the owner of a charm bracelet before Christmas Eve.

programme.title: We Need a Little Christmas
programme.desc: Facing her first Christmas as a single mother, Julie develops an unexpected friendship with an older neighbor.

programme.title: Christmas in Angel Falls
programme.desc: Guardian angel Gabby is sent to the town of Angel Falls to restore its Christmas spirit. As she helps the townspeople to revive their traditions, Gabby meets a volunteer fire chief who teaches her the truth about the love she admires from afar.

programme.title: Armageddon
programme.desc: A NASA rep (Billy Bob Thornton) recruits an oil driller (Bruce Willis) and his team of mavericks to save Earth from an oncoming asteroid.

programme.title: Pacific Rim
programme.desc: A washed-up ex-pilot and an untested trainee must drive an old, obsolete robot in a last-ditch effort to repel a lethal force of monstrous invaders.

programme.title: Košarka - Euroleague: Barcelona - Fenerbahce
programme.desc: Najjače klupsko takmičenje u košarci na području Evrope svake sezone privlači pažnju velikog broja zaljubljenika košarku. Kao takmičenje visokog kvaliteta verujemo da će privući vašu pažnju. (LIVE).

programme.title: Pregled Jedrenje: Vendee Globe
programme.desc: Vendée Globe je jedna od najzahtevnijih regata za jedriličare na svetu. U ovom takmičenju jedriličari su sami na svojim plovilima u trci oko sveta.

programme.title: E-Sports: CS2 - Shanghai Major 2024
programme.desc: Najbolji Counter-Strike timovi sveta doleću u Šangaj kako bi se borili na drugom ovogodišnjem Major turniru. Da li će NAVI odbraniti titulu ili će G2 otplesati svoj poslednji ples sa dugo očekivanim...

programme.title: Uži izbor
programme.desc: Najbolji sportisti svih vremena, iz svih sportova. Na istom mestu, u isto vreme, kako ih uporediti i kako napraviti večne liste. Neko će probati ono o čemu se decenijama priča...

programme.title: Fudbal - Bundesliga 2: Koln - Nurnberg
programme.desc: Popularna "Cvajta" čini se, nikada nije bila jača. Ko će se od velikana vratiti u prvu ligu? Mesta je malo a kandidata mnogo.

programme.title: Fudbal - 3. Bundesliga: Saarbrucken - Alemmania
programme.desc: Neki nekadašnji šampioni Nemačke su ovde. Ulazak u Cvajtu znači mnogo slave i novca, ali dug je i naporan put do cilja.

programme.title: Fudbal - Bugarski kup: 1/8 Finala: Beroe - Lokomotiv Plovdiv
programme.desc: Kup Bugarske u fudbalu održava se još od 1938. godine. U takmičenju učestvuju svi zvanično registrovani klubovi, sve utakmice se igraju na sistem eliminacija, sve do polufinala kada se igraju i...

programme.title: Fudbal - Holandska liga: Feyenoord - Heracles
programme.desc: Očekuje se trka Ajaksa i PSV-a za titulu. Može li Fejenord da im se priključi ili će AZ Alkmar napasti iz senke?

programme.title: Fudbal - Švajcarska liga: Basel - Grasshopper
programme.desc: Švajcarska Super liga pod tim nazivom se vodi od 2003. godine, dok je prvi prvak okrunjen davne 1898. Prvi prvak i najuspješniji klub sa čak 27 titule je Grasshopper Club Zürich.

programme.title: Fudbal - Bundesliga 2: Karlsruher - Regensburg
programme.desc: Popularna "Cvajta" čini se, nikada nije bila jača. Ko će se od velikana vratiti u prvu ligu? Mesta je malo a kandidata mnogo.

programme.title: Rivalitet legendi
programme.desc: Vukli su jedni druge napred, uvek je neki rivalitet izdizao sport na lestvicu više. Najbolji sportisti svih vremena, iz svih sportova.

programme.title: Fudbal - Turska 2. liga: Istanbul - Erzurum
programme.desc: Pratite 2. tursku fudbalsku ligu, takmičenje trećeg nivoa unutar ligaškog sistema.

programme.title: Američki koledž fudbal: Celebration Bowl: South Carolina State - Jackson State
programme.desc: Koledž fudbal je američki fudbal koji igraju timovi sportista-studenata u okviru američkih koledža, univerziteta i vojnih akademija. Univerzitetski fudbal je jedna stepenica niže u odnosu na...

programme.title: Na današnji dan
programme.desc: Podsećanje na godišnjice uspeha sportista, klubova i reprezentacije koji su se dogodili na današnji dan.

programme.title: Košarka - Slovenačka liga (M): LTH Castings - Šentjur
programme.desc: Olimpija je favorit u Sloveniji, ali plasmani njihove reprezentacije pokazuju da imaju veoma široku bazu igrača. Možda budemo svedoci nekog iznenađenja? (LIVE).

programme.title: Sport & Tech Lifestyle
programme.desc: Emisija Sport & Tech Lifestyle vodi vas kroz svet najnovijih lifestyle i tehnologija u sportu.

programme.title: Košarka - Nemačka liga: Ulm - Heidelberg
programme.desc: Iz godine u godinu, Bundesliga je jača. Zna se da su Alba i Bajern uvek moćni, ali sada imaju i žestoku konkurenciju.

programme.title: Pregled Evrokupa
programme.desc: Drugo po težini takmičenje u evropskoj klubskoj košarci sigurno zavređuje pažnju ljubitelja košarke. Iako je pomalo u senci Evrolige, Evrokup nudi obilje iznenađenja i kvalitetne košarke.

programme.title: Omaž zvezdama
programme.desc: Bokseri, fudbaleri, košarkaši... Najbolji sportisti svih vremena, iz svih sportova. Na istom mestu, u isto vreme, kako ih uporediti i kako napraviti večne liste.

programme.title: Fudbal - Bugarski kup: 1/8 Finala: Krumovgrad - Arda
programme.desc: Kup Bugarske u fudbalu održava se još od 1938. godine. U takmičenju učestvuju svi zvanično registrovani klubovi, sve utakmice se igraju na sistem eliminacija, sve do polufinala kada se igraju i...

programme.title: Fudbal - Portugalska liga: Porto - Estrela Amadora
programme.desc: Prvi liga portugalskog fudbala, Primeira liga, osnovana je 1934. i broji 18 klubova. Najviše osvojenih titula prvaka ima lisabonski gigant Benfika.

programme.title: Uži izbor
programme.desc: Najbolji sportisti svih vremena, iz svih sportova. Na istom mestu, u isto vreme, kako ih uporediti i kako napraviti večne liste. Neko će probati ono o čemu se decenijama priča...

programme.title: Fudbal - Turska liga: Galatasaray - Trabzon
programme.desc: Turska Superliga je najviša profesionalna liga Turske u fudbalu. Ova liga osnovana je 1957. godine.

programme.title: Fudbal - 3. Bundesliga: Arminia - Unterhaching
programme.desc: Neki nekadašnji šampioni Nemačke su ovde. Ulazak u Cvajtu znači mnogo slave i novca, ali dug je i naporan put do cilja.

programme.title: Fudbal - Bugarski kup: 1/8 Finala: Spartak Varna - CSKA
programme.desc: Kup Bugarske u fudbalu održava se još od 1938. godine. U takmičenju učestvuju svi zvanično registrovani klubovi, sve utakmice se igraju na sistem eliminacija, sve do polufinala kada se igraju i...

programme.title: Fudbal - Grčka liga: Levadiakos - Panathinaikos
programme.desc: Voli se fudbal u Grčkoj i svaki duel, pogotovo derbi, doživljava se sa mnogo strasti. Olimpijakos jeste favorit za titulu, ali AEK, PAOK i večiti rival Panatinaikos kucaju na vrata...

programme.title: Fudbal - Holandska liga: Ajax - Almere
programme.desc: Očekuje se trka Ajaksa i PSV-a za titulu. Može li Fejenord da im se priključi ili će AZ Alkmar napasti iz senke?

programme.title: Fudbal - Bundesliga 2: Greuther Furth - Hannover
programme.desc: Popularna "Cvajta" čini se, nikada nije bila jača. Ko će se od velikana vratiti u prvu ligu? Mesta je malo a kandidata mnogo.

programme.title: Rivalitet legendi
programme.desc: Vukli su jedni druge napred, uvek je neki rivalitet izdizao sport na lestvicu više. Najbolji sportisti svih vremena, iz svih sportova.

programme.title: Fudbal - Bundesliga: Mainz - Bayern
programme.desc: Fudbalska Bundesliga najviši je rang takmičenje u Nemačkoj koja od 1963. godine i svog osnutka visokom kvalitetom igre oduševljava sve fudbalske poklonike širom sveta.

programme.title: Fudbal - Turska liga: Hatay - Goztepe
programme.desc: Turska Superliga je najviša profesionalna liga Turske u fudbalu. Ova liga osnovana je 1957. godine.

programme.title: Fudbal (M) - koledž prvenstvo: Finale
programme.desc: Donosimo vam najbolje trenutke sa Američkog fudbalskog turnira na kome učestvuju fakulteti. Ovaj uzbudljiv sportski događaj odvija se pod pokroviteljstvom Nacionalne akademske atletske asocijacije...

programme.title: Pregled holandske lige
programme.desc: Očekuje se trka Ajaksa i PSV-a za titulu. Može li Fejenord da im se priključi ili će AZ Alkmar napasti iz senke?

programme.desc: Najjače klupsko takmičenje u košarci na području Evrope svake sezone privlači pažnju velikog broja zaljubljenika košarku. Kao takmičenje visokog kvaliteta verujemo da će privući vašu pažnju. (LIVE).

programme.title: Pregled španske košarke
programme.desc: Donosimo pregled mečeva i klipove najboljih trenutaka iz Endese, najjače košarkaške lige Španije.

programme.title: Košarka - Euroleague: Alba - Zalgiris
programme.desc: Najjače klupsko takmičenje u košarci na području Evrope svake sezone privlači pažnju velikog broja zaljubljenika košarku. Kao takmičenje visokog kvaliteta verujemo da će privući vašu pažnju. (LIVE).
